hero.title: The AI Behind
hero.subtitle: blipee
hero.description: Not just another ESG platform. blipee is your autonomous AI team that works 24/7 to manage, optimize, and improve your sustainability performance.
hero.mainDescription: Where AI meets sustainability with a touch of magic ✨ The revolution isn't coming—it's here, and it speaks your language. Welcome to the future where saving the planet feels like chatting with your smartest friend.

features.title: Revolutionary Capabilities
features.subtitle: The most advanced sustainability platform, powered by AI that predicts, advises, and acts

conversational.title: 100% Conversational
conversational.description: No dashboards, no complex forms. Just ask your AI anything about sustainability

scopeTracking.title: Scope 1, 2, 3 Tracking
scopeTracking.description: Complete emissions tracking across your entire value chain, automatically

scienceTargets.title: Science-Based Targets
scienceTargets.description: AI sets and tracks SBTi-aligned targets, ensuring you meet climate goals

documentIntelligence.title: Document Intelligence
documentIntelligence.description: Upload any invoice, bill, or report. AI extracts emissions instantly

buildingExcellence.title: Building Excellence
buildingExcellence.description: World-class building management capabilities integrated seamlessly

complianceAutomation.title: Compliance Automation
complianceAutomation.description: Stay ahead of regulations with AI that monitors and ensures compliance

useCases.title: Works for
useCases.subtitle: See how organizations achieve their sustainability goals through conversation

buildings.title: For Buildings
buildings.query: Reduce our building emissions by 40% this year
buildings.response: Analyzed your energy patterns and identified 2 optimization opportunities that will reduce emissions by 42% while saving $127,000 annually.

manufacturing.title: For Manufacturing
manufacturing.query: What's our carbon footprint per product unit?
manufacturing.response: Each unit produces 12.7 kg CO₂e. Main hotspot: raw materials (45%). Switching to Supplier B for aluminum would reduce this by 23%.

energy.title: For Energy
energy.query: Show me renewable energy performance across all sites
energy.response: Solar generation up 18% this month. Site 3 performing 30% above target. Recommend battery storage for Site 5 to capture $85K in grid credits.

retail.title: For Retail
retail.query: How can we achieve net zero by 2030?
retail.response: Created your roadmap: LED retrofits (Q2), renewable contracts (Q3), fleet electrification (Q4). This pathway achieves net zero by 2029.

aiCapabilities.title: 12 AI Brains Working
aiCapabilities.subtitle: Our multi-brain AI architecture ensures every aspect of sustainability is covered, from real-time monitoring to predictive analytics and autonomous actions.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How quickly can I get started?
faq.a1: Our 7-minute setup gets you running immediately. No complex implementation needed.
faq.a2: Not at all! blipee is designed for everyone. If you can chat, you can use blipee.
faq.a3: Absolutely. We use bank-level encryption and are SOC 2 Type II certified.
faq.q4: Can I integrate with existing systems?
faq.a4: Yes! We integrate with all major ERP, IoT, and business systems.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Sustainability?

cta.waitingMessage: Your AI sustainability team is waiting for you

hero.title: About
hero.description: We're building the world's first Autonomous Sustainability Intelligence platform that transforms traditional dashboard-based ESG management into conversational AI that works 24/7 as your digital sustainability team. Our mission is to create not just software, but AI employees that autonomously manage, optimize, and improve sustainability performance across any industry.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where every organization has access to intelligent, autonomous sustainability management—where environmental stewardship is not a burden but an empowering, data-driven advantage. We envision a future where AI employees work alongside human teams to make sustainability decisions in real-time, turning compliance into competitive advantage and environmental responsibility into business growth.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize sustainability intelligence by building AI systems that eliminate the complexity, cost, and expertise barriers that prevent organizations from achieving their environmental goals. We exist to make sustainability management accessible to every organization—from startups to enterprises—by providing autonomous AI employees that understand, predict, and optimize environmental performance without requiring specialized knowledge or massive resources.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide how we work, make decisions, and build our culture

relentlessInnovation.title: Relentless Innovation
relentlessInnovation.description: We believe in pushing boundaries and challenging the status quo. Every day we ask: how can we make sustainability management 10x better, not just incrementally improved?

customerObsession.title: Customer Obsession
customerObsession.description: Our customers' success is our success. We listen deeply, iterate rapidly, and won't rest until sustainability teams feel empowered rather than overwhelmed by their tools

transparencyTrust.title: Transparency & Trust
transparencyTrust.description: We build with openness—transparent about our AI decisions, our data usage, and our company progress. Trust is earned through consistent actions, not promises

globalImpactMindset.title: Global Impact Mindset
globalImpactMindset.description: Every feature we build, every decision we make is evaluated through the lens of global environmental impact. We're not just building software; we're fighting climate change

qualityOverSpeed.title: Quality Over Speed
qualityOverSpeed.description: We move fast but never compromise on quality. Our AI must be reliable, our data accurate, and our insights actionable—because sustainability decisions matter too much to get wrong

diversePerspectives.title: Diverse Perspectives
diversePerspectives.description: The climate crisis affects everyone differently. We build an inclusive team with varied backgrounds because diverse perspectives lead to better solutions for a global challenge

scheduleDemo.title: Schedule a Demo
scheduleDemo.description: Get in touch with our team to see blipee in action

hero.badge: Every Industry. Every Organization. Every Goal.
hero.description: blipee works with any organization, in any industry, of any size. From startups to Fortune 500s, from manufacturing to services, we make sustainability simple and achievable for everyone.

coverage.title: Your Industry Is Covered
coverage.description: Sustainability challenges are universal. Whether you're tracking emissions, managing energy, reducing waste, or reporting ESG metrics, blipee adapts to your specific industry requirements and regulations.

anySector.title: Any Sector
anySector.description: From heavy industry to digital services, our AI understands your unique sustainability challenges.

anyStandard.title: Any Standard
anyStandard.description: GRI, SASB, TCFD, CSRD, EU Taxonomy - we support all major sustainability frameworks and regulations.

anySize.title: Any Size
anySize.description: From small businesses to multinational corporations, our platform scales with your needs.

intelligence.title: Industry Intelligence
intelligence.subtitle: How We Organize Industries
intelligence.description: These are just examples. If your industry isn't listed, we still work with you. Our AI adapts to any sustainability challenge.

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing & Production
manufacturing.description: Any company that produces goods or products

energyUtilities.description: Power generation, distribution, and utility services

manufacturingProduction.title: Manufacturing & Production
manufacturingProduction.description: Any company that produces goods or products

energyUtilities.title: Energy & Utilities
energyUtilities.description: Power generation, distribution, and utility services

compliance.title: Compliance Standards
compliance.description: Full compliance with Global Reporting Initiative sector-specific standards and CSRD (Corporate Sustainability Reporting Directive). Our AI knows the exact requirements for your industry.

gri11.title: GRI 11
gri11.description: Comprehensive sustainability reporting for oil and gas operations

gri12.title: GRI 12
gri12.description: Sustainability standards for coal mining and processing

gri13.title: GRI 13
gri13.description: Food production and agricultural sustainability reporting

gri14.title: GRI 14
gri14.description: Mining operations and extractive industry standards

gri15.title: GRI 15
gri15.description: Chemical industry sustainability and safety reporting

header.title: Sustainability Overview
header.subtitle: GRI 305 • GHG Protocol • Executive summary of emissions and targets

totalEmissions.title: Total Emissions
totalEmissions.tooltip: Sum of all GHG emissions (Scope 1+2+3) in the selected period. Measured in tonnes of CO2 equivalent (tCO2e). Year-over-year change shows trend vs. previous period.

intensity.title: Intensity
intensity.tooltip: Emissions per employee (tCO2e/FTE). Efficiency metric that normalizes emissions by organization size. Enables comparison over time and with peers.

targetProgress.title: Target Progress
targetProgress.tooltip: Number of targets on track vs. total active targets. Targets are considered on track when current emissions are below the required linear trajectory.

dataQuality.title: Data Quality
dataQuality.tooltip: Percentage of primary data (direct measurements) vs. estimates. Third-party verified primary data increases reporting credibility. GRI 305, ESRS E1.

scopeBreakdown.title: Emissions by Scope
scopeBreakdown.tooltip: GHG emissions distribution by scope. Scope 1: direct emissions. Scope 2: purchased energy. Scope 3: value chain. GRI 305-1/2/3, TCFD, ESRS E1.

scope1Tooltip.title: Scope 1: Direct Emissions
scope1Tooltip.description: Direct GHG emissions from sources owned or controlled by the organization (e.g., company vehicles, on-site fuel combustion)

scope2Tooltip.title: Scope 2: Purchased Energy
scope2Tooltip.description: Indirect emissions from purchased electricity, heating, cooling, and steam. Dual reporting per GRI 305-2 & GHG Protocol.

scope3Tooltip.title: Scope 3: Value Chain Emissions
scope3Tooltip.description: All indirect emissions in value chain (upstream & downstream). Per GRI 305-3.

emissionsTrend.title: Emissions Trend
emissionsTrend.tooltip: Monthly emissions evolution by scope with ML forecast. Solid lines: actual data. Dashed lines: forecast based on historical patterns. TCFD, ESRS E1.

organizationalBoundaries.title: Organizational Boundaries
organizationalBoundaries.tooltip: Emissions reporting perimeter: consolidation, facilities, base year, and employees. GRI 2-1, GRI 2-6, GHG Protocol.

topEmitters.title: Top Emission Sources
topEmitters.tooltip: Your five largest emission sources across Scope 1, 2, and 3. Focus your reduction efforts on these categories for maximum impact. Hover over each category to see tailored recommendations.

recommendations.naturalGas: 🔥 Install heat pump system for efficiency

sbtiProgress.title: SBTi Target Progress
sbtiProgress.tooltip: Science Based Targets (SBTi) are emission reduction targets aligned with climate science to limit global warming to 1.5°C. This tracks your progress from baseline to target year, showing actual emissions, ML forecasts, and the required reduction trajectory.

dataInvestigation.title: Data Investigation
dataInvestigation.subtitle: Detailed monthly breakdown of all sustainability metrics
dataInvestigation.anomaliesFound: The following anomalies were found in the {year} data:
dataInvestigation.noteOctoberMarch: Note: It appears that October data may have been incorrectly recorded as March, resulting in duplicate March entries and missing October data.
dataInvestigation.noData: No data available for the selected period.
